snippet: It’s the rare director who can transform the familiar into something brand new. Nicolas Roeg succeeded handsomely with “The Man Who Fell to Earth.”
lead_paragraph: It’s the rare director who can transform the familiar into something brand new. Nicolas Roeg succeeded handsomely with “The Man Who Fell to Earth.”

headline.main: The Man Who Fell Into Movie Acting
